org.deeplearning4j.nn.api

Interface Layer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, Model, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AutoEncoder, BaseLayer, BasePretrainNetwork, ConvolutionDownSampleLayer, ConvolutionLayer, LSTM, OutputLayer, RBM, RecursiveAutoEncoder, RNTN, SubsamplingLayer

    public interface Layer
extends java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, Model
    Interface for a layer of a neural network. This has an activation function, an input and output size, weights, and a bias

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Layer.Type

      • error

        Gradient error(org.nd4j.linalg.api.ndarray.INDArray input)
        Calculate error with respect to the current layer. This gradient will contain the error signal
        Parameters:
        input - the gradient for the forward layer If this is the final layer, it will start with the error from the output. This is on the user to initialize.
        Returns:
        the gradient wrt the parameters on the current layer

        input - the input to take the derivative of
        Returns:

      • errorSignal

        @Deprecated
Gradient errorSignal(Gradient error,
                              org.nd4j.linalg.api.ndarray.INDArray input)
        Deprecated. 
        Error signal for this layer Using the amount of error caused by this layer calculate the error signal used as input in to the next layer. This is used for actually calculating the gradient of the layer
        Parameters:
        error -
        input -
        Returns:

      • backWard

        @Deprecated
Pair<Gradient,Gradient> backWard(Gradient errors,
                                          Gradient deltas,
                                          org.nd4j.linalg.api.ndarray.INDArray activation,
                                          java.lang.String previousActivation)
        Deprecated. 
        Propagate errors backwards for a particular layer. This calculates the node error for a given true output.
        Parameters:
        errors - the errors to propagate
        deltas - the previous deltas
        previousActivation - the previous layer's activation
        activation - the activation from the previous layer
